Title: What payment method was used to pay invoice #101010
QueryBody: select payment_method from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and transaction_id = "101010"

Title: What are my AR this month/last month?
QueryBody: select strftime("%m", transaction_date), sum(amount) from master_txn_table where account = "Accounts Receivable (A/R)" and strftime("%m", transaction_date) >= strftime("%m", current_timestamp) - 1 group by strftime("%m", transaction_date)

Title: How much revenue came through weiskopf consulting last month?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where customers = "weiskopf consulting" and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_date) - 1 and account_type in ('Income','Other Income')

Title: What is my average invoice from diego rodriguez?
QueryBody: select avg(amount) from (select distinct transaction_id, amount from master_txn_table where customers = "diego rodriguez")

Title: What was the min invoice amount for sale of product income in since <date>?
QueryBody: select min(credit) from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and instr(account,"sale of product income") and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: Show number of transactions with Mr B
QueryBody: select transaction_type, count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = 'B' or vendor = 'B'

Title: Total sales for each product
QueryBody: select product_service, sum(credit) from master_txn_table group by product_service;

Title: Show how many transactions you've had with pye's cake
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "pye's cake"

Title: Last 7 days, what are my AP?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where account = 'account payable' and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "-7 days") AND date( current_date)

Title: When did barnett design last pay?
QueryBody: select transaction_date from master_txn_table where customers = "barnett design" and transaction_type = 'payment' order by transaction_date desc limit 1

Title: What was our greatest expense Last fiscal year?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year','-1 years', '+3 months') AND date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year','-1 years', '+3 months', '+1 years', '-1 days'); order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: How many pye's cake invoices are still outstanding?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "pye's cake" and open_balance > 0 and transaction_type = 'invoice'

Title: How many invoices have we sent to customer john melton?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "john melton" and transaction_type = 'invoice'

Title: How much revenue came through paulsen medical supply in month of august
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = 8 and T1.customers = "paulsen medical supply"

Title:
which travel category  cool car am paying the most for 
in month of july
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where customers = "cool car" and instr(account,"travel") and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = 7 and account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense')

Title: How many invoices are still oustanding for rondonuwu fruit and vegi as of This quarter?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "rondonuwu fruit and vegi" and transaction_type = 'invoice' and open_balance >0 and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: How many days past due is invoice #101010
QueryBody: select due_date - transaction_date from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and transaction_id = "101010"

Title: How much cash did we collect yesterday, by Salesperson?
QueryBody: select misc.salesperson, sum(credit) from master_txn_table where account in ('Income','Other Income') and transaction_date = date(current_date, "-1 days")

Title: How much has rago travel agency been paying us every month
QueryBody: select strftime("%m", transaction_date), sum(credit) from master_txn_table where customers = "rago travel agency" group by strftime("%m", transaction_date);

Title: What were my outgoings during the This quarter?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)  and account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense')

Title: What was the General Ledger Account 762 for the year?
QueryBody: select * from master_txn_table as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_id = "762" and strftime("%Y", transaction_date) = strftime("%Y", current_date)

Title: How much has Salesperson X collected in "Bond Fees" yesterday?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where account in ('Income','Other Income') and transaction_date = date(current_date, "-1 days") and misc.salesperson = X and product_service = 'Bond fees'

Title: What is jeff's jalopy credit for MTD?
QueryBody: select sum(open_balance) from (select distinct transaction_id, open_balance from master_txn_table where customers = "jeff's jalopy" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)  and account = 'account receivable')

Title: This year to date, how many installation did wedding planning by whitney sell?
QueryBody: select sum(quantity) from master_txn_table where customers = "wedding planning by whitney" and product_service = "installation" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, 'start of year') AND date(current_date)

Title: What was the highest invoice amount for installation?
QueryBody: select max(credit) from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and instr(account,"installation")

Title: Show number of transactions with Mr B
QueryBody: select transaction_type, count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = 'B' or vendor = 'B'

Title: What's the last journal entry that 55 twin lane recorded?
QueryBody: select * from journal_entry where customer_name = "55 twin lane" order by transaction_date desc limit 1

Title: How many days past due is invoice #101010
QueryBody: select due_date - transaction_date from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and transaction_id = "101010"

Title: What payment method was used to pay sales receipt #101010
QueryBody: select payment_method from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'sales receipt' and transaction_id = "101010"

Title: What was our total spend for telephone in last 12 months
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where instr(account,"telephone") and strftime("%m", transaction_date) >= strftime("%m", current_timestamp) - 12 and account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense')

Title: What are my total sales by gardening?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and product_service = "gardening"

Title: How much has travis waldron been paying us each month?
QueryBody: select strftime("%m", transaction_date), sum(credit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where customers = "travis waldron" and account_type in ('Income','Other Income') group by strftime("%m", transaction_date)

Title: august, what are my AR?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table where account = 'account receivable' and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: How much did 0969 ocean view road spend Last quarter?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where customers = "0969 ocean view road" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)  and account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense')

Title: How many checks were received yesterday?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'check' and transaction_date= date(current_date, "-1 days")

Title: what was our top 3 selling products and their sales in q1
QueryBody: select product_service, sum(quantity) from master_txn_table as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income', 'Other Income') and strftime("%m", transaction_date) in ("01", "02", "03") group by product_service order by sum(quantity) desc limit 3;

Title: How much credit does customer 55 twin lane have month to date/year to date
QueryBody: select balance from customers where customer_name = "55 twin lane"

Title: What are my total project costs for Project XYZ?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table where misc.project = 'XYZ'

Title: When was dukes basketball camp first payment?
QueryBody: select transaction_date from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'payment' and customers = "dukes basketball camp" order by transaction_date limit 1

Title: How many jeff's jalopies invoices haven't been paid yet?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "jeff's jalopies" and open_balance > 0 and transaction_type = 'invoice'

Title: What was our total spend for tania's nursery in the This fiscal year to date?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where vendor = "tania's nursery" and account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year', '+3 months') AND date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year','+1 year', '+3 months', '-1 day')

Title: What are my account payable This year to date?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where account = 'account payable' and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, 'start of year') AND date(current_date)

Title: What was our smallest expense Last 30 days?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "-30 days") AND date( current_date)  order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: How many credit card transactions occurred yesterday?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table as T1 join payment_method as T2 on T1.payment_method = T2.payment_method where T2.credit_card = "yes" and T1.transaction_date = date(current_date, "-1 days")

Title: In the MTD, how many sod did kookies by kathy sell?
QueryBody: select sum(quantity) from master_txn_table where customers = "kookies by kathy" and product_service = "sod" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: How much credit does rago travel agency have Last 30 days?
QueryBody: select sum(open_balance) from (select distinct transaction_id, open_balance from master_txn_table where customers = "rago travel agency" and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "-30 days") AND date( current_date)  and account = 'account receivable')

Title: Show number of transactions with Mr B
QueryBody: select transaction_type, count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = 'B' or vendor = 'B'

Title: This fiscal year to date, what was our smallest expense?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year', '+3 months') AND date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year','+1 year', '+3 months', '-1 day') order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: What was my total sales for diego rodriguez during last month?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where customers = "diego rodriguez" and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_timestamp)-1;

Title: Since This fiscal year, how many invoices have gone unpaid?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and due_date < current_date and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year', '+3 months') AND date(current_date) and open_balance > 0
